mapper.insert: insert into store ( store_idx, member_idx, store_name, store_image, store_num, store_email, store_address, store_area, store_activity_time, store_content, store_rnum ) values( store_seq.nextval, #{member_idx}, #{store_name}, #{store_image}, #{store_num}, #{store_email}, #{store_address}, #{store_area}, #{store_activity_time}, #{store_content}, #{store_rnum} )
mapper.update: update store set store_name = #{store_name}, store_image = #{store_image}, store_num = #{store_num}, store_email = #{store_email}, store_address = #{store_address}, store_area = #{store_area}, store_activity_time = #{store_activity_time}, store_content = #{store_content}, store_rnum = #{store_rnum}, store_lat = #{store_lat}, store_lng = #{store_lng}, store_regcode = #{store_regcode} where store_idx = #{store_idx}
mapper.select: select member_idx from store where member_idx = #{member_idx}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM STORE WHERE STORE_ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{store_address}||'%' ORDER BY dbms_random.random ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
select * from store WHERE store_regcode LIKE #{gu} || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT s.*, 6371 * ACOS( COS(RADIANS(#{lat})) * COS(RADIANS(s.store_lat)) * COS(RADIANS(s.store_lng) - RADIANS(#{lng})) + SIN(RADIANS(#{lat})) * SIN(RADIANS(s.store_lat)) ) AS distance FROM store s WHERE s.store_lat IS NOT NULL AND s.store_lng IS NOT NULL ORDER BY 6371 * ACOS( COS(RADIANS(#{lat})) * COS(RADIANS(s.store_lat)) * COS(RADIANS(s.store_lng) - RADIANS(#{lng})) + SIN(RADIANS(#{lat})) * SIN(RADIANS(s.store_lat)) ) ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{amount}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT s.*, 6371 * ACOS( COS(RADIANS(#{lat})) * COS(RADIANS(s.store_lat)) * COS(RADIANS(s.store_lng) - RADIANS(#{lng})) + SIN(RADIANS(#{lat})) * SIN(RADIANS(s.store_lat)) ) AS distance FROM store s WHERE s.store_lat IS NOT NULL AND s.store_lng IS NOT NULL AND 6371 * ACOS( COS(RADIANS(#{lat})) * COS(RADIANS(s.store_lat)) * COS(RADIANS(s.store_lng) - RADIANS(#{lng})) + SIN(RADIANS(#{lat})) * SIN(RADIANS(s.store_lat)) ) <= #{kilometer} ORDER BY distance ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{amount}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT s.*, 6371 * ACOS( COS(RADIANS(#{lat})) * COS(RADIANS(s.store_lat)) * COS(RADIANS(s.store_lng) - RADIANS(#{lng})) + SIN(RADIANS(#{lat})) * SIN(RADIANS(s.store_lat)) ) AS distance FROM store s WHERE s.store_hidden = 0 AND s.store_lat IS NOT NULL AND s.store_lng IS NOT NULL AND s.store_address LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY distance ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{amount}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT s.*, 6371 * ACOS( COS(RADIANS(#{lat})) * COS(RADIANS(s.store_lat)) * COS(RADIANS(s.store_lng) - RADIANS(#{lng})) + SIN(RADIANS(#{lat})) * SIN(RADIANS(s.store_lat)) ) AS distance, CASE WHEN s.store_address LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' THEN 1 WHEN s.store_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' THEN 2 WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM menu m WHERE m.store_idx = s.store_idx AND m.menu_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ) THEN 3 ELSE 4 END AS priority FROM store s WHERE s.store_hidden = 0 AND s.store_lat IS NOT NULL AND s.store_lng IS NOT NULL AND ( s.store_address LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR s.store_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM menu m WHERE m.store_idx = s.store_idx AND m.menu_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ) ) ORDER BY priority, distance ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{amount}
